title: Haim Album Cover Font
content:
I'm looking to identify the font used on the Haim album cover. I have attached an image. Thank You!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HaimType.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217233842/http:/typophile.com/files/HaimType.jpg) | 16.54 KB |
author: kkmarch7

comments.content: It must be **[Nouvelle Vague](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217233842/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Nouvelle%20Vague%20-%20Nouvelle%20Vague%20Black&fid=e65887ff9d62e672232e19c5e0a8862d&fsize=60&text=HAIM&fit=1)** by Dirk Schuster (free for personal use)
